reviewText:
Early Access Review

Pretty fun game, using a Xbone1 Controller. Easy to play, fun.

Pros
-If you have people for LAN
-Like Controller Games
-Like Top-down Games/Arenas
-Does have online function, though you might be waiting for new players new release.
Cons
-Brand new, no sale yet, so be a while before other players.
-Bots get boring even in hardest setting. Although they are a great way to practice.
-Possibly no newer content, abilities using buttons with be nice.
-Can get boring from repetitive in general. But I can see myself logging in a few times a day to play.

Overall, great game. Just needs new features and if you are hesistant to pay, wait for a sale.

reviewText:
Early Access Review

Mech Anarchy is a great top-down arcade shooter.

The twin stick shooter control scheme works perfectly for the fast paced action in this game. The enemies range from incredibly stupid to incredibly smart depending on the setting chosen for their AI.

The online multiplayer portion of this game is where the action is at. The netcode seems flawless, with no noticeable lag on the client. The game currently supports games of 8 players on-line, hopefully more in the future.

I had an incredibly fun time playing this game through different iterations as new builds were released, and I can honestly recommend it to anyone who wants to have some fun with friends online.
